1.content: Which gender would you want gaining?
1.title: Gender?

11.content: Which of these female androids?
11.title: Android?

choices: The hose starts to fatten up, with different kind of food.
The hose starts to make her belly swell up.
1113.content:
Sunny Day.

2B is walking though a abandoned town. With almost nobody, but, random robots roaming the place. Which didn't bother 2B not one bit, as she, just simply avoids the roaming robots. Which seemed pretty easy, but not until a weird turtle looking robot showed up. Getting her sword out and ready to fight that robot. But the turtle robot surprised the Android female, with three hoses coming out of it shell. Which confused 2B, but it didn't took long until one of the hoses went into her mouth.
1113.title: Other

choices: She wants to gain more weight for battle.
112.content: A2 is too skinny, how should she bloat up?
112.title: A2

choices: A strange growling sound came from her midsection.
1121.content: A2 was wandering the desert, looking for machines to kill. Suddenly one popped out of the ground basically out of nowhere. She attempted to slash at it when all of a sudden it hacked into her. A2 fell to the ground for a moment, and then the machine was gone. A2 found this confusing but carried on fighting through the dry desert anyway. Suddenly,
1121.title: Hacked!

info.description:
The androids are gonna be gaining some weight!
Stuffing/Inflation/Expansion/Berry is fine too.



Welcome! All I ask really is nothing too disgusting like scat and stuff like it.
If you're gonna write for an entry make sure it's at least a paragraph long, too.
